channel.title: How do I hide Ip box on client?
channel.description:
How can I remove the IP type in box on my client.
For Example, this is what it looks like:
[b]Username: Password: Server IP: Port:[/b]
This is what I want it too look like: [b]Username: Password:[/b]
Help please~[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2008, 03:58:13 pm[/size][hr]help
